# isSupported

**Type Property**

A property that indicates whether the current device supports card session functionality.

## Declaration

```swift
class var isSupported: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

Query this property before calling [doc://com.apple.corenfc/documentation/CoreNFC/CardSession/init()] to avoid raising [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/fatalError(_:file:line:)] on ineligible devices.

## Determining card session availability

- **isEligible**: A property that indicates whether the current system supports card session functionality.
